d) g(x) =−f(−x −1) + 3 The a = −1 indicates a reflection in thex-axis, thek = −1
indicates a reflection in they-axis, the d = −1 (from x −d = x −(−1) =x + 1)

(−1)(−2) + 3 = 5 Therefore, the resulting point is(−2, 5) . 8
